asset.author: Dyson US
asset.hookText:
http://www.dysonairblade.com

City by city, Dyson is transforming restrooms across America with Airblade™ Technology. The old meets the new as Airblade™ technology comes to the historic Fox Theatre in Atlanta, Georgia. 

Originally built in the 1920s for Atlanta's Shriners, the Fox Theatre has survived demolition to become one of the country's most iconic entertainment venues -- with approximately 750,000  visitors per year. Fox is a part of the Atlanta Better Buildings Challenge, a presidential initiative to make commercial buildings 20% more energy efficient by 2020.

As part of this sustainability initiative, Fox has partnered with Dyson to install new Dyson hand dryers in its restrooms. The new Dyson technology will help Fox reduce carbon emissions by 70%.


http://www.youtube.com/dysonus
https://www.facebook.com/dyson
https://twitter.com/Dyson
